ComicInfo.Title: Time of the Trolls!
ComicInfo.Summary: Time of the Trolls!: Loki is sentenced to the place of punishment for his role in starting Ragnarok. The new Thor takes Sif to a distant land to be his queen. Hela and her horde of Trolls prepare to storm the rainbow bridge.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:16:22. [Issue ID 32788]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: The Midgard Serpent (cameo),Warriors Three [Hogun,Harris Hobbs (reporter),Fandral,Joey (sound man),Balder,Hela (villain),Sigyn,Volla,Frigga,Thor [Roger "Red" Norvell],Sif,Enchantress (flashback,Executioner (flashback,Heimdall,Odin,Thor,Ljos-Alfar (Bright Elves),Fenris,Volstagg],Loki (villain),cameo)
